general_info.summary: This text appears to be a list of program offerings, school affiliations, and administrative/developmental initiatives at Sharda University, including its School of Dental Sciences, School of Medical Sciences & Research, and Sharda School of Nursing Science & Research. It also highlights various academic and student support services such as an Academic Bank of Credits, curricula feedback, examination reports, career counseling, and entrepreneurship programs, along with the university's FM radio station, Suno Sharda-90.8FM. The source of this information is indicated as the Sharda University website, specifically the BSc IT program page.

career_info.summary: This course prepares students for engineering careers, with graduates typically securing positions that offer an average annual salary package between 3.51 LPA and 4.50 LPA.
career_info.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
Students of this programme are placed in companies with an average annual package of 3.51 LPA to 4.50 LPA
Take the next step towards a career in engineering.
